login.title: Enter your information below to begin tracking patients you test for Ebola.
login.notes: **Notes to share with government health team**

phoneLoginVerification.incorrectCodeBody: Please check that the code you entered is correct

details.patientNotesPlaceholder: Will be shared with government workers
details.photoNote: Click to add a photo of the RDT strip to this record
details.followUp:
**Follow-up:**
If this patient is determined to be positive for Ebola, or a government health worker has questions, you will be contacted on this phone via voice, text, or a message below.
details.startChat: **Chat with a government health worker regarding {{firstName}} {{lastName}}:**
details.chatPlaceholder: Enter a note to send to a government health worker
details.note: **Note:** If this patient is determined to be positive for Ebola, you will be contacted by a government healthcare worker at {{phone}} (via voice or text)

photoCapture.error: There was an error capturing the photo, please try again

cameraPermissions.alertMsg: EVD Track needs access to your camera to record patient test results.
cameraPermissions.title: Camera Permission Required
cameraPermissions.why: We're sorry, but access to your device's camera is required. To continue, please update your device settings.

locationPermissions.alertMsg: EVD Track needs access to your location so it can accurately report patient data.
locationPermissions.title: Location Permission Required
locationPermissions.why: We're sorry, but access to your device's location is required. To continue, please update your device settings.
